pepper.framework.abstract.intention module¶

class pepper.framework.abstract.intention.Intention(application)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Intention class is at the base of more involved robot applications. They build on top of Application instances an allow for switching of robot contexts.

Attributes:
application

Application Intention is based on

dependencies

Intention Dependencies

log

Intention Logger
